resources.string: Learn How to Grow Your Own Veggies!
Indeterminate tomatoes need constant pruning so they don\'t get bushy. Also, don\'t water these plants every day; just a deep watering every couple of days is better.
Cucumbers need a structure to wrap their tendrils around so the plant can grow upwards. Cucumbers are mostly water so be sure to water this plant frequently!

Buying Locally can have a lot of perks so be sure to check out your local Farmers\' Market. A lot of Farmers\' Markets sell a lot more than just produce- here is an example of some fresh locally-made ice cream available at a Farmers

Buying local can have a lot of perks, so be sure to check out your local Farmers\' Market. Many Farmers\' Markets sell a lot more than just produce; here is an example of fresh, locally-made ice cream available at a local Farmers\' Market. How cool!
